text: The Ninth National Census of Population of the Dominican Republic was raised from 1–7 December 2010, during the presidency of Leonel Fernández. This census collected information respect on sex, occupation, age, fertility, marital status, nationality, literacy, ability to vote, and housing. == General results == {| class="wikitable" id="cx9"
